title: Timing constants location
details:
All timing constants for Firefox storage operations are centralized in src/constants.js. Key constants:
- FIREFOX_STORAGE_LISTENER_LATENCY_MAX_MS = 250 (Firefox Bugzilla #1554088 documented behavior)
- STORAGE_LATENCY_BUFFER_MS = 50 (safety buffer)
- STORAGE_DEDUP_WINDOW_MS = 300 (self-write detection)
- STORAGE_ORDERING_TOLERANCE_MS = 300 (event ordering validation)
- OUT_OF_ORDER_TOLERANCE_MS = 100 (cross-tab timing)
- FALLBACK_SYNC_TIMEOUT_MS = 2000
- TAB_ID_FETCH_TIMEOUT_MS = 2000
These should be imported from constants.js, not redefined locally.
